price: Kuma idan sun gan ka, bã su rikon ka fãce da izgili, (sunã cẽwa) "Shin, wannan ne wanda Allah Ya aiko, Manzo?
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awka in yattakhidhūnaka illā huzuwan ahādhā alladhī baʿatha al-lahu rasūlan
